<h1 align="center">Movie App</h1>

<p> From this app, you can check the movie description and release date.
</p>
<p> 
Developed by me in one day
</p>
<p> 
Here I made use of OMdb api to fetch the movie details
</p>
<p>Tech stack: HTML, CSS, Javascript, BootStrap</p>
